catalogue.message: Actions you may perform on this task:
Select Continue to send the item to the next workflow step.
Select Return to send the item back to the previous workflow step if it is not compliant with all the rules.
The item sent is compliant with all the rules defined for being added at {0}!
Warning, this submission does not respect the rules defined for being added at {0}!
This item is not eligible for the {0} compliance policy

Any submission to the repository can potentially comply to the HAL guidelines. You should not see this message, as this indicates that the publication has not met eligibility requirements for HAL compliance.
The submission of non-compliant items is blocked for this collection.
* These values were estimated so that they could be used in the compliance check. They will receive a “real” value upon item archival or at the end of the embargo.
You must resolve the compliance issues before continuing the submission.
Item compliance with submission rules at {0}
It appears that your submission complies to the REF OA requirements. This means you do not have to select an exception above.

Your submission does not comply with the Open Access requirements for the next REF. You can select an exception above related to the requirements listed below or proceed to the ‘REF Compliance’ step to check why your submission is not compliant. The following requirements are not met:
